name: Spooples
description:
Spooples, a ghost who wants to escape the Underworld, is lost and needs your help! Survive as long as possible by flying through gaps found in the walls of flesh. Demon dogs from the Underworld will attempt to attack you, but you can shoot them with bubbles to clear the way! How long do you think you can you last?

Game Controls:

Space: Jump
Enter: Shoot
VHS Setting: Click the VHS icon
Leave: Esc or X

Have fun! <3
